name: The Notion Bible
description: Become an expert in Notion in no-timeA detailed 130-page step-by-step guide to help you go from beginner/intermediate to expert level in using and understanding Notion through 4 in-depth chapters containing 22 lessons.✓ Go from Notion novice to Notion expert✓ Learn simple, intermediate and advanced features✓ Explore Notion for countless of different use casesCheck out our website for a full preview:TheNotionBible.comWho am I?I'm an Official Notion Ambassador and I've built over 50+ Notion worksp
features: I don't know where to learn Notion; I'm unsure about what to use Notion for; I'm overwhelmed with all the options available; I don't know what the different blocks actually do; I don't understand databases and complicated features; I can't seem to evolve my Notion skills no matter what I do; Lesson 1: Introduction to Notion; Lesson 2: How to learn Notion; Lesson 3: Starting with the basics & building; Lesson 4: Common resources for learning Notion
